Package httpserver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTTPHandler
    An HTTPHandler is what all handlers used by your server descend from.
    HTTPHandlerFactory
    An HTTPHandlerFactory is a factory that's used to determine what kind of HTTPHandler should be used in the HTTPRequest.
    HTTPRequest
    An HTTPRequest takes an incoming connection and parses out all of the relevant data, supposing the conneciton follows HTTP protocol.
    HTTPResponse
    This is the response to the client's request.
    HTTPServer
    HTTPServer is a relatively simple class with one job, and one job only: wait for incoming connections, and send the connections over to an HTTPRequest and an HTTPResponse.
    MessageHandler
    A MessageHandler is a simple handler that sends a simple text message to the client.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HTTPException
    An HTTPException is just a generic exception.
